events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer role, highlighting strong experience in backend development.
Application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords related to software development and engineering.
Recruiter Emily was assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate upcoming screening and interviews.
Initial telephonic screening was conducted, with the candidate demonstrating solid knowledge and enthusiasm for the engineering role.
The candidate promptly responded to the recruiterâ€™s email, confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
Technical interview was scheduled with the engineering team for 2024-05-08 at 10 AM UTC, focusing on system design and coding.
